page.title: 10WHITSUNTIDE WALKS
page.content: On Whit Sunday the congregations of the churches walk round their local area in a procession. We do this to show that we are christian and that we belive in{GOD.}Whit Sunday is a very enjoy able happy occasion. Each congregation assembles in thier owm church but the churches often meet each other and have a large open air service. The vicar walks at the front of the parade followed by people carrying the church banner. Behind them we have a Rose Queen and her retinue and she is followed by the uniformed organisarion such as cubs , scouts,brownies and guides.The adults from the congregation always walk at the end so that nobody lags behind. Most churches have a band to accompany them and often stop and sing hymns.In the old days all children used to have new clothes for whitsuntide.
